com.koverse.sdk.source

Class AbstractFileBasedSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koverse.sdk.source.AbstractListMapReduceSource
      • com.koverse.sdk.source.AbstractFilteredListMapReduceSource
        • com.koverse.sdk.source.AbstractFileBasedSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListMapReduceSource, SourceDescription, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public abstract class AbstractFileBasedSource
extends AbstractFilteredListMapReduceSource
    Mostly handles logic for accessing files in compressed or archived formats.
